summary: Hedex Bot - Hedex at heart is an Ethereum wallet analysis and tracking bot, we have created two bots which work hand in hand to analyse, find and track alpha traders! We are excited to announce that we are creating and releasing a utility token! We want to make Hedex accessible to everyone and spread the word of our work and what Hedex can do! With the community in mind we will be releasing a subscription model which will allow users to use Hedex at different tier levels depending on the amount of Hedex Token they hold! We have a bright future ahead and won’t stop until everyone has heard about what we are building!
